view

Class RespCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.RespCreator

  • public class RespCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creating the response to servlet request Returns it as a HTML page

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RespCreator()
      Argumentless constructor It sets the proper fields values and creates new conversion history
